Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to termination of membership in a New York state retirement system
Summary: Relates to termination of membership in a New York state retirement system.
LawCode: Add §540, Ed L; add §§113-b & 411-a, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the retirement and social security law, in relation to termination of membership in a New York state retirement system
